text: With megastar Justin Timberlake walking right toward him during the Super Bowl LII halftime show at U. S. Bank Stadium, 13 - year - old Ryan McKenna knew he had to take his shot. He quickly stopped the video he was recording and raced to open the camera app on his iPhone. “ I just thought to myself, ‘ I ’ ll never get this opportunity again in my whole life,'” McKenna said. “ I just went for it. ” WATCH IT AGAIN : Justin Timberlake ’ s Super Bowl halftime In that moment, little Ryan McKenna went viral. “ My phone started blowing up, ” father John McKenna said. “ It died, like, instantly after it happened.
